txt.en:
Orcs have begun to increase in number and move northwards, becoming a terrible threat to the peoples of Eriador.

Any who could make forays against their camps around the lakes in the southern plains will discourage these foes from spreading further. The kindred of Rangers are stretched thin across the North Downs and beyond on missions of great import, and are unable to deal with this threat.

Whoever completes this request shall be rewarded.
You have assisted the Rangers of Esteldín in their daily vigilance, maintaining that the lands of the North Downs are free from enemy control.
'The Orcs of Angmar are a threat not just to our secrecy, but to the Free Peoples of Eriador...dispatch them with abandon!'
The Rangers have requested help in securing the lands around Esteldín and warding off any threats.
The Orcs threatening the central North Downs can be found around the farm fields and rolling hills of Kingsfell.\n\nYou should foray against the Orcs, and drive them away.
You have assisted the Rangers of Esteldín in their daily vigilance, maintaining that the lands of the North Downs are free from enemy control.
